name: Whack (only) the mole
description:
GMC Jam 38 - Three Simple Rules Entry

Rule 1. Whack only the Mole
Rule 2. Pet only the Bunny
Rule 3. Give the mushroom to only the badger

This game played entirely on a keyboard, utilising the A-Z keys along with SHIFT and CTRL.

2 Modes
26+2 Key - Normal Mode
9+2 Key - Easy Mode

All audio assets from Kenney Asset pack 1 (CC-0)
Everything else created by me during the jam period.
